item.title: Wordpress 添加和移除 css, js
item.description:
<?php

add_action('wp_enqueue_scripts', function () {
    //remove
    wp_deregister_style('woocommerce-general');
    wp_dequeue_script('wc-cart');

    //add
    wp_enqueue_style('custom-css',  get_template_directory_uri(). '/css/custom.css');
    wp_enqueue_script('custom-js', get_template_directory_uri() . '/js/custom.js');

}, 99);

item.title: wordpress xmlrpc
item.description:
Wordpress xmlrpc 实际上也是用了IXR 类库。wp_xmlrpc_server 继承了IXR_Server。 业务逻辑基本上在 wp_xmlrpc_server 上。

<?php
//简单远程发布文章例子
include 'IXR_Library.php';

$url = 'http://www.wp.dev/xmlrpc.php';
$blog_id = 1;
$username = 'admin';
$password = 'admin';


$data = array(
    'post_type' => 'post',
    'post_content' => 'hello, world',
    'post_title' => 'hello!!'
);

$params = array($blog_id, $username, $password, $data);


$client = new IXR_Client($url);

$client->query('wp.newPost', $params);
//$client->query('demo.sayHello');
$r = $client->getResponse();

print_r($r);
